department: Industry, Science and Economic Development Canada
short_summary: Canada is digitally connecting all 14 of Canada's business registries to reduce barriers to internal trade and improve the competitiveness of Canadian businesses.
description: The procurement seeks to understand the level of interest, as well as any challenges, of the vendor community in delivering the requirement. The delivery date is mentioned to be the closing date of this procurement.
full_summary:
=========================

**Notice of Request for Information: Multi-Jurisdictional Registry Access Service (MRAS)**

**Reference:**
PW-__ZM-383-41471

**Request for Information Documents:** Available on Canada’s Liquid Procurement System (CLPS) at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/07/13/aa89d3ad9981638180db01a7560d3292/ABES.PROD.PW__ZM.B383.E41471.EBSU001.PDF / https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/06/14/0c57011a614867e39b90740aa75b3b3f/ABES.PROD.PW__ZM.B383.E41471.EBSU000.PDF / https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/06/14/dd4764ecbdacd26dc86ee33164fe55a6/ABES.PROD.PW__ZM.B383.E41471.ATTA001.PDF / french versions: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/06/14/503c5098ced0be218c64e2f51beb0813/ABES.PROD.PW__ZM.B383.F41471.EBSU000.PDF / https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/06/14/9f6547d657b6371380cbd7db970d6a31/ABES.PROD.PW__ZM.B383.F41471.ATTA001.PDF

**Tender Details:**

* **Reference Number:** PW-__ZM-383-41471
* **Solicitation Number:** U6265-218741/C
* **Publication Date:** June 15, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 28, 2023 14:00:00
* **Estimated Project Duration:** Up to the deadline mentioned.
* **procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Trade Agreements:** This procurement is not subject to any trade agreements.
* **Regions of Delivery:** Across various Canadian provinces and territories with an extension to National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Trade Agreement:** None

**Project Objective:**
Industry
